section.title: SystemBuilder Files and Folders
section.para: SystemBuilder has several key files and folders, listed in the table below.

row.entry: SystemBuilder looks for this file to locate systembuilder configuration. See the systembuilder and systembuilder.conf man pages for more information. This file is optional and does not exist in the default SystemBuilder installation.
Python code for SystemBuilder, where $version is the Python version.
Documentation for SystemBuilder, where $version is the SystemBuilder version.
Relax NG schemas for system definition validation.
SystemBuilder stores cached content in this folder. See the systembuilder and systembuilder.conf man pages for cache-related options.
SystemBuilder publishes completed system distributions to this folder by default. An alternative location can be specified on a per-system-distribution basis within a system definition.
